scenes.description: The audience chants for an encore after the main performance ends. Fuwawa and Mococo reappear on stage in new outfits.
Fuwawa and Mococo greet the audience and introduce their next song.
Performance of the song 'side by side'.
MC section where Fuwawa and Mococo thank the audience and talk about the song 'side by side'.

subtitles.original: Lyrics: Kris Roche / Music: Alobahn (-81), Kris Roche / Arrangement: Alobahn (-81)
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Kris Roche / Music: Alobahn (-81), Kris Roche / Arrangement: Alobahn (-81)

subtitles.original: Bau bau! Thank you for always being here for FuwaMoco!
subtitles.english: Bau bau! Thank you for always being here for FuwaMoco!

subtitles.original: Please listen to:
subtitles.english: Please listen to:

subtitles.original: side by side!
subtitles.english: side by side!

subtitles.original: Finally we made it through but not without some tears
subtitles.english: Finally we made it through but not without some tears

subtitles.original: With the help of friends so true we faced all of our fears
subtitles.english: With the help of friends so true we faced all of our fears

subtitles.original: Now we're here to celebrate all that we have done
subtitles.english: Now we're here to celebrate all that we have done

subtitles.original: I can feel it's more than just a game of fate
subtitles.english: I can feel it's more than just a game of fate

subtitles.original: 'cause our stories have just begun
subtitles.english: 'cause our stories have just begun

subtitles.original: Hand in hand we're not waiting on tomorrow
subtitles.english: Hand in hand we're not waiting on tomorrow

subtitles.original: From now on its the heart that we will follow
subtitles.english: From now on its the heart that we will follow

subtitles.original: We'll move on passed the heartbreak and the sorrow If you stay by my side

subtitles.english: from inside as hearts collide

subtitles.original: Bringing out the best in each other now
subtitles.english: Bringing out the best in each other now

subtitles.original: we're feeling free like were meant to be
subtitles.english: we're feeling free like were meant to be

subtitles.original: Even though there's been rough times when nobody wanted us,

subtitles.original: Thank you for the encore, Ruffians!

subtitles.original: That was: side by side! Bau bau!

subtitles.english: Yeah! We're so happy to perform it for the first time!

subtitles.original: Side by side is a song made by Alobahn-san, but also between FuwaMoco!
subtitles.english: Side by side is a song made by Alobahn-san, but also between FuwaMoco!

subtitles.original: Yeah, it's ours! We know it's a song that you love a lot,
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's ours! We know it's a song that you love a lot,

subtitles.original: but we also do because it's very special to us
subtitles.english: but we also do because it's very special to us

subtitles.original: since it's the ending theme for a visual novel that we care about!
subtitles.english: since it's the ending theme for a visual novel that we care about!

subtitles.original: NEKOPARA!
subtitles.english: NEKOPARA!

subtitles.original: And with this song, our dream of seeing the opening or ending theme for a visual novel came true!
subtitles.english: And with this song, our dream of seeing the opening or ending theme for a visual novel came true!

subtitles.english: Yeah! That's right, with this song, FUWAMOCO's dream of singing a theme song for a bishoujo game came true!

subtitles.english: Our dream came true! Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: And thank you so much for joining us for our special day again this year!

subtitles.original: It's been a dream with you!
